    HexRowChange - Record Class in dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services
    This class represents a change that will be applied to a file when the LazyHexList.add(HexRow), LazyHexList.remove(int), or LazyHexList.set(int, HexRow) method is called.
    HexRowChange(int, int, HexRow) - Constructor for record class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.HexRowChange
    Creates a new HexRowChange object of type ChangeType.UPDATE that will update data at the given row offset in a file when LazyHexList.set(int, HexRow) is called.
    HexRowChange(int, HexRow) - Constructor for record class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.HexRowChange
    Creates a new HexRowChange object of type ChangeType.REMOVE that will remove data at the given row offset from a file when LazyHexList.remove(int) is called.
    HexRowChange(ChangeType, int, int, HexRow) - Constructor for record class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.HexRowChange
    Creates a new HexRowChange object with all four properties that can be configured.
    HexRowChange(ChangeType, int, HexRow) - Constructor for record class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.HexRowChange
    Creates a new HexRowChange object with the given properties and column set to zero.

    L

    LazyHexList - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services
    LazyHexList is a memory-efficient implementation of an AbstractList that provides random access to chucks of a file.
    LazyHexList(File) - Constructor for class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.LazyHexList
    Creates a new instance of a LazyHexList.

    longToHex(long) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.LazyHexList

    V

    validateNewValue(String) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.utils.ValidationUtils
    Validates that the given value is not less than zero and not greater than 255.
    validateRowAndColumnNumbers(String, String, int, int) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.utils.ValidationUtils
    Validates that all the following conditions are met: 0 <= lastRowIndex 0 <= lastColumnIndex 0 <= rowText <= lastRowIndex 0 <= columnText < AppConstants.CHUNK_SIZE In addition, if rowText is equal to lastRowIndex, columnText must not be greater than lastColumnIndex.
    validateRowNumber(String, int) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.utils.ValidationUtils
    Validates that the given row index is not less than zero and not greater than the last index in a LazyHexList.
    ValidationUtils - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.utils
    This utility class contains methods for validating data such as row indexes, column indexes, and byte values.
    valueOf(String) - Static method in enum class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.ChangeType
    Returns the enum constant of this class with the specified name.
    values() - Static method in enum class dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.services.ChangeType
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum class, in the order they are declared.
